This app is designed to be used as a steering wheel in some popular truck simulators like Euro Truck Simulator 2 and American Truck Simulator.

Developer: Alex Churkin

Contact:
churkindev@gmail.com

The application uses icons from here:
http://icons8.com
First, you need to download Truck Remote Server and run it on your PC. You can do it by this link: https://github.com/alexChurkin/TruckRemoteServer .

As you can see, you can specify connection port and steering sensitivity as you want. Then you need to start the game and select Keyboard + vJoy in Controls. It\'s also recommended to increase \"Steering sensitivity\" and \"Steering non-linearity\" as here:
Make sure all keys in the control settings are set as standard and \"Automatic blinker turn off\" option is disabled. Enter the game and proceed to the next step.

Ensure that your phone/tablet is connected to the same network as the PC. Connect your Truck Remote Control app to Server app on your PC. This can be done automatically or manually. You can configure a standard ip/server in the settings. If you haven\'t used Truck Remote Control before, please turn off truck turn signals, disable parking break and all headlights by keyboard (do not leave the high beam enabled when low beam is disabled).\n\nNOTE: You can enable cruise control by swiping gas up!
P.S. Truck Remote Server is still in development. Therefore, we apologize for some wrong work. Pleasant use!
